title: Backend Developer
responsabilities: Implement front-end code with low-fidelity wireframes as guidance
Develop new user-facing features, coordinating with backend REST API developers and stakeholders
Maintain and expand test coverage in front-end code
Maintain consistency of user experience and design language
necessary skills: Ability to craft visually consistent and intuitive components
Eye for design and user experience

responsabilities: Implement front-end code with low-fidelity wireframes as guidance

Maintain consistency of user experience and design language
necessary skills: Ability to craft visually consistent and intuitive components
